text: The Segunda División is the third league of Mexico. Until the 1993-1994 season, the champion of had been promoted to the Primera División. ==Serie A clubs== Below are listed the member clubs of the Serie A for the 2020-21 season. Group I Group II * Alacranes de Durango * Atlético San Luis * Atlético Reynosa * CAFESSA * Cimarrones de Sonora * Colima * Correcaminos UAT * Gavilanes de Matamoros * Leones Negros UdeG * Mazorqueros * Mineros de Fresnillo * Saltillo * Tecos * Tuzos UAZ * Aguacateros CDU * Atlético Irapuato * Azores de Hidalgo * Cafetaleros de Chiapas * Cañoneros Marina * Ciervos * Cruz Azul Hidalgo * Cuervos de Silver Soccer * Dongu * Héroes de Zací * Inter Playa del Carmen * La Piedad * Pioneros de Cancún * Zitácuaro Category:1950 establishments in North America Category:1950s establishments in Mexico Category:Football leagues in Mexico
title: Segunda División de México
